title: 6.3 Master Challenge 1
question: The table below shows different plants and their height over a period of five weeks. Calculate the change in height of each plant after five weeks and display the information as a line chart. (Note: cm is used for centimeters.)

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
